name: market for carton board box production, with offset printing | carton board box production, with offset printing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7085/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'carton board box production, with offset printing', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;“Carton board box production, with gravure printing” represents the service of producing carton board box production with gravure printing. This service does not include the input of carton board and only includes the steps of cutting, folding and printing with a gravure machine. This service allows the users to model the production of different carton board boxes according to their needs. Per kg of used carton board, 0.83 kg of this module are required. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'carton board box production, with offset printing',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'carton board box production, with offset printing',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
